# Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


# Load data and clean
```{r}
# load data
glass <- read.csv("glass.csv", header = FALSE)
head(glass)

# check for missing values
is.na(glass) # no missing values

# rename columns
glass %>%
  rename(c(ID = V1, RI = V2, Na = V3, Mg = V4, Al = V5, Si = V6, K = V7,
           Ca = V8, Ba = V9, Fe = V10, Type = V11)) -> glass
head(glass)
```
